# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

Sheryl P. Walter 


                                                   Message Text



 032034Z
ACTION OCS-06


INFO OCT-01 ADS-00 /007 W
          ------------------043215 032038Z /23
P 032000Z MAY 79
FM AMEMBASSY LA PAZ
TO SECSTATE WASHDC PRIORITY 6069


UNCLAS LA PAZ 3885


E.O. 12065: N/A
TAGS: CASC, BL (VICENTE, JUDITH)
SUBJECT: W/W FUNDS: JUDITH VICENTE


REF: STATE 104651


VICENTE APPEARED AT CONSULAR SECTION ON MAY 2, 1979 CLAIMING
THAT SOMEONE IN BOLIVIA HAD GUARANTEED HER HOTEL BILLS AND
THEREFORE SHE WAS FREE TO LEAVE THE COUNTRY. HER REMAIN-
ING PROBLEM IS THAT HER EXCURSION AIRLINE TICKET HAS
EXPIRED. SHE NOW NEEDS ONLY THE ADDITIONAL FUNDS TO MAKE
UP THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN AN EXCURSION FARE AND A FULL
FARE. VICENTE HAS SIGNED A PRIVACY ACT RELEASE FOR HER
MOTHER, IDA RIVERA; 220 E. 115 ST. APT 5A, NY, NY 10029.
VICENTE REQUESTS THAT HER MOTHER SEND TO HER $225 TO
COVER THE COSTS OF THE TICKET AND INCIDENTAL EXPENSES
UNTIL SHE LEAVES. EMBASSY REQUESTS THAT IN ADDITION TO
THE $225 THAT VICENTE'S MOTHER SEND $100 MORE TO COVER
THE COSTS OF PHONE CALLS HER DAUGHTER MADE FROM THE
CONSULAR SECTION TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEW YORK.
BOEKER








NNN




             Sheryl P. Walter 

           Sheryl P. Walter
